H0.text: The 1997 transfer of Hong Kong from Great Britain to China is well-known. But in 1999, which country similarly relinquished its claim on Macau also handing it over to China. Portugal

H1.text: The 1997 transfer of Hong Kong from Great Britain to China is well-known. But in 1999, which country similarly relinquished its claim on Macau also handing it over to China. Spain

H2.text: The 1997 transfer of Hong Kong from Great Britain to China is well-known. But in 1999, which country similarly relinquished its claim on Macau also handing it over to China. France

H3.text: The 1997 transfer of Hong Kong from Great Britain to China is well-known. But in 1999, which country similarly relinquished its claim on Macau also handing it over to China. Potiti

A4.text: The handover of Macau from the Portuguese Republic to the People's Republic of China (PRC) officially occurred at midnight on 20 December 1999.

A5.text: The Sino-Portuguese Joint Declaration was formally signed by the Prime Ministers of both the People's Republic of China and the Portuguese Republic in Beijing on 13 April 1987.
